title: Captions Multi-Language
p1: Introducing the revolutionary new app that creates subtitles in multiple languages. With Captions Multi-Language, you can upload your video and have it automatically generate captions in a variety of languages, including Spanish and English.
p2: Our app uses the latest in machine learning technology to ensure that your captions are accurate and easy to read. And with the ability to share your video with multiple audiences, you can reach more people than ever before.
p3: Stay tuned for updates on our progress and be one of the first to try Captions Multi-Language.
